title: Freefont from schriftgestaltung.de
content:
Submitted by [Reetsde](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904/http:/www.typophile.com/user/8183 "View user profile.") : 14.Mar.2007 1.52am 

The monospace font [Olivegreen Mono Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904/http:/www.schriftgestaltung.de/index.php?inhalt=Schriften&seite=OlivegreenMono) by [Georg Seifert](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904/http:/www.reets.de/) is on a 100% discount for the next 45 days, available immediately from [myFont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schriftgestaltung/olive-green-mono).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/olivegreen_freefont_420_3830.jpg)

The rather upright geometric design of the monospace font is contrasted with the very vibrant, playful italic.

Schriftgetaltung.de [germ, Typedesign] is a small foundry that published fonts by Georg Seifert and offers a platform for friends to present their own fonts.

- Specimen: [Schriftgestaltung.de/seite/Schriften/OliveGreenMonoSpezimen.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904/http:/www.schriftgestaltung.de/seite/Schriften/OliveGreenMonoSpezimen.pdf)
- Purchase: [myFonts.com/fonts/schriftgestaltung/olive-green-mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/schriftgestaltung/olive-green-mono)
- Georg Seifertâ€™s Website: [reets.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20080203202904/http:/www.reets.de/)
author: Reetsde
